lender.name: TAG Opportunities
lender.loan_because: As a group we want to help others who haven't had the opportunities that we have.

lender.name: Federico Family
lender.loan_because: we love to see people succeed at improving their quality of life.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Microfinance loans help fund entrepreneurs around the world in a fiscally responsible way.
lender.occupational_info: I find investments in start up technology companies.

lender.name: Seiders Family
lender.loan_because: Our family has been very blessed, and we want to share those blessings. We also believe in hard work and taking charge of one's life. God bless these people who have the desire to make a difference in THEIR life!

lender.name: The Obers
lender.loan_because: Our faith teaches us of a God that loves each and calls us to help others
lender.occupational_info: Brian is a software programmer and a volunteer minister. Kathy is a medical coder for a Chicago hospital. Ashlyn and Isaac are both students in school

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I have lived in both Central & South America and I know how hard single mothers work to feed and educate their families. I just want to assist someone make a better life.

lender.name: Octavio
lender.loan_because: We are just ONE.
lender.occupational_info: Living a life and making sense for me and others.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: I have a burden for people who want to make something of their lives but are restricted financially.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the children who don't have family to be there for them.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to sing.

lender.name: mommy,daddy,nicky,&nati
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people take control of their own lives, even better than fishing for someone, enabling them to make a living by fishing.
lender.occupational_info: Dad, is the General Manager for Procter & Gamble's operations in Puerto Rico. So he too is a business person responsible for efficiently running a business operation.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: It's fun, and a better investment than Wall Street right now.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Whitman College in Walla Walla, Washington, studying politics and environmental studies.

lender.name: Erick
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want my kids to grow up knowing how truly lucky they are, and that it is within their power to help someone.

lender.name: Doug
lender.occupation: Web developer for a major U.S. airline
lender.loan_because: The world's resources are unfairly distributed (cruelly so) and this is a small step in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: The team I work with is a wonderful mixture of skilled people (marketers, testers, computer programmers); we work together to add features on the airline's website and make life easier for our customers. Outside of work I enjoy travel, hiking, and spending time with my partner.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I have it and they don't
lender.occupational_info: I keep track of money for a union, make sure things are paid properly, and provide information so the union can plan for future expenses.

lender.name: Debbie and Daniel
lender.loan_because: we are lucky enough to be able to.

lender.name: The Woolley's
lender.loan_because: We need to give back & realize how fortunate we are.
lender.occupational_info: I cook for private parties & provide staffing & he trains drivers.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: as Gandhi said, "Be the change you wish to see in the world."

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I am living a beautiful life, and want to help others live a beautiful life.
lender.occupational_info: I write novels about changing the world through the power of positive thought.

lender.name: Chase Rief
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves. This is a great program - much better than a straight hand out.
lender.occupational_info: This is a great program and I love seeing it evolve and grow over time.

lender.name: Aiysha
lender.loan_because: As a student of economics I have learned that there has been so much development to help those who already have and no development to help those who don't. I feel that it is imperative and inevitable that we all come together to do our part to create a new pillar in the foundation of this worlds economy. It is amazing how such a small contribution can make a world of difference, and it is about time micro finance became an integral part of the way we do business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of economics bored and annoyed of the same monotonist capitalistic theories taught in school. I am looking for new frontiers to become a part of, and want to be a part of better cause than helping the rich get richer, I want to help those who have hopes and dreams make them come true for a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I can afford to.
lender.occupational_info: university teaching

lender.name: Celebrating Friends
lender.loan_because: Anytime is a good time to celebrate friendship and share our good fortune.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It's the responsibility of everyone alive to look after those less fortunate than they. We get through the hardships of this world easiest by paying forward the courtesies we've enjoyed.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because:
I began making loans through Kiva over 4 years ago, in memory of my father, who taught me to believe that we can all change the world. It doesn't have to be on some grand scale - sometimes the smallest gifts will produce the largest benefits.
Now I am totally hooked - each time repayments are made, I can fund yet another venture, and so on and so on. My thanks to Kiva and all of those who contribute for making this possible.

lender.name: Deb and WWW
lender.loan_because: We all have what we need- we want to help others, particularly women.
lender.occupational_info: We are a varied group of women, some working, some retired, but all very involved in our community

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.occupational_info: work for government agency that gives grants to communities for public health services

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.

lender.name: Joe and Mary
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life, and I hope I can make a small difference in a constructive way for my sisters and brothers across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write manuals that explain how to use something, such as a computer or a music player (iPod).

lender.name: LB2
lender.loan_because: I care that there are others in the world who need an extra hand to just get them started. Im about trying to make a difference in the world & showing my Children that it only takes one person to make a small but huge change in someone elses life.
lender.occupational_info: Im a P.T Health Worker and a F/T mom with 3 lovely foster children and 1 son of my own. We are a very busy family who care about the world and the ppl in it. I love my jobs and do them with great compassion.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: We all share one world: a small blue marble in a huge black sky. Citizens of the First World should act to relieve the worst crises of poverty through humanitarian aid â and also to foster the development of an educated, prosperous and successful middle class around the globe. This, I believe, is an excellent way to create a safer and healthier life for all. Thanks to Kiva for creating a channel through which we can share our wealth in a way that honours dedicated effort, healthy ambition and human dignity.
lender.occupational_info: My staff and I provide financial services to arts and heritage organizations. We offer bookkeeping services, plus support with planning, analysis and reporting.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large casino.

lender.name: Kelly, Scott & Shane
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who are willing to help themselves for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Skin Care Specialist

lender.name: Mihwa
lender.loan_because: I want eeeeeeeeeeveryone in the world to be happy.
lender.occupational_info: I am 35 years old woman from Seoul, South Korea. I am working for a cosmetic company. Last night I watched Oprah Winfrey show and I've got to know about Kiva.org. I was so touched and just carried the inspiration into practice today. I am very happy that I became a lender. Thank you, Kiva!

lender.name: Patrick and Juliet
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference and demonstrate to my grandaughter what can be done to help others who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a power plant that produces electricity.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: Whether you know how to fish or not is inconsequential if you don't have a a fishing pole.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of a hand up vs. a hand out.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate and I hope to help others.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Mari
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people build better lives for themselves
lender.occupational_info: I am a health practitioner who tries to empower my clients to heal themselves as much as possible while I am treating them, so they do not depend on me forever. I believe in supporting the Kiva entrepreneurs because I want to "help people help themselves"- that is the best way to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Carol
lender.occupational_info: Charitable, and kindly... though i am unemployed, others are in worse shape than I.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and it fits for me
lender.occupational_info: I listened to people and converted their ideas into computer applications

lender.name: Sonya
lender.loan_because: Sometimes we all just need a little help. Helping in a small way can make such a big difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Girl Scouts is an organization that helps girls develop confidence, courage and character. They work on activities that help them develop a strong value system and positive leadership skills.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: a lucky accident of latitude and longitude allows me to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I study Neuroscience at Westminster College in Salt Lake City, Utah. I volunteer with many organizations that seek to end hunger and homelessness, both in Salt Lake City and abroad.

lender.name: Kayla
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do to help my global community.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find the information they need.

lender.name: Favo Family
lender.loan_because: My grandfather was first generation American, the second oldest in a family of 14. He had an 8th grade education. Somehow this man was able to get capital and start a number of businesses. He was very successful and help a great deal of people.I do not know how he ever got those first loans, but we want to pay it forward to those hard working people in the world, who have the odds against them, but are willing to take a chance. We hope our loans can help.

lender.name: Adrian & Peggy
lender.loan_because: We can think of few better ways to help people become self sufficient. Using the same money many times to help an increasing number of people help themselves is perfect.

lender.name: Sheldon
lender.loan_because: It just feels nice.
lender.occupational_info: Work with children and adults who are having problems adjusting to life.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because:
I can so I do...share the wealth so to speak.....the little I loan is a mere pitance to me, but it is life changing for the the loan reciepients. It makes me feel good to help someone out. I appreciate my good fortune in life and realize how fortuante i am as a canadian citzen.
in the end, you do good: you get good
lender.occupational_info: I work in the pet food industry as a territory sales manager for a pet food distributor. I call on pet stores to sell the, pet food and pet accessories.

lender.name: jacob
lender.loan_because: It is the easiest, smartest, no-brainer way to help people out. And with my limited sources, I can make a difference over and over again.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Jewish non-profits to help people live lives filled with joy, meaning and loving kindness. I do this because all humans are connected to One Source and to help someone else is to help oneself.

lender.name: Chunsang
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make my life more meaningful by making other's lives more meaningful.
lender.occupational_info: Embeded software engineer for mobile phone and application processors.

lender.name: Richard & Janice
lender.loan_because: Jesus taught that we should use our blessings to help others.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: ...it not only makes me feel good to help others, it helps others make their own impacts through self-subsistence.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world - to give people a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I lead projects to build web sites and web applications that are customer and marketing oriented.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I love people!!!

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I can share my blessings with others who desire to make their lives better
lender.occupational_info: I assist the partners who teach skills that allow individuals, organizations and countries to become more vital, creating sustainable change for good.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I have such abundance in my life, and I want to spread it around.
lender.occupational_info: I help keep track of the money for a large school district.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need a little help getting started
lender.occupational_info: I help people and businesses with legal advice and representation

lender.name: Bria
lender.loan_because: I would like to help out more in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 11yrs old and in 6th grade. I like crafts, singing, dancing, and being with my friends. I also love computers.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: it takes so little to make such a large difference!

lender.name: Cale
lender.loan_because: My finance and I are graduate students at the University of Wisconsin (I am pursing my MBA, and Michelle is pursuing her Masters in Education). We found this opportunity to invest as an excellent way to support entrepreneurs in developing regions of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Cummins Inc (www.cummins.com). Cummins is a global manufacturer of diesel power solutions. I am responsible for sourcing activities for the North American After Market business.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I like to make people happy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Technology Manager at a large advertising agency in New York City. My group within the company builds websites and interactive media for customers.

lender.name: Stewart
lender.loan_because: I believe in the passion of the entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of software engineers and write software to manage and track the usage of web applications.

lender.name: Rozel
lender.loan_because: Matthew 5:42

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: want to help those that help themselves move onwards and upwards.
lender.occupational_info: mother to two small children and helpmate to my husband and our family business.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I like to know my money is actually being put to good use, and what better way to do so!
lender.occupational_info: Student by day................................. .....gas station attendant by night.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: why not?
lender.occupational_info: Moving to China on Wednesday so you'll know when I know! Focusing on communications services for a firm that specializes in statistical analysis in the financial services industry. Apologies because that is probably very opaque.

lender.name: Robert F Campbell
lender.loan_because: It enables me to help those who I know who are helping themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help people build wind farms

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: If you want to give a gift that can really change the world for the better, this is just one of those gifts...
lender.occupational_info: Technology Industry

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe in a fair and just world where all people have equal opportunities. I don't believe in nationality - I envision one unified planet where we all work together and share resources. Simply because I was born in a wealthy nation should not give me more human rights than someone who was born in a lesser developed country.
lender.occupational_info: I write reports that analyze the impact on the environment from specific development projects that impact the land, or the impacts of decisions that would change the way that governments manage their lands.

lender.name: Nel
lender.occupational_info: I am a teachers assistant

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: Nothing changes until somebody does something.
lender.occupational_info: I write short and long fiction stories.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I'm privileged to have resources that I can share. I'm thrilled with the fact that an entrepeneur can build a better life for themselves with a little help from me.
lender.occupational_info: biotech drug development

lender.name: Donald and Marie
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to improve there life regardless of age, race, gender.
lender.occupational_info: We are so lucky to live in Canada and our work is challenging and exciting, its great to help someone out. Cheers!!

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to university students

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I'm married with two teenagers. In my free time I designs and sell my jewelry creations.

lender.name: Natalie, Ben, and Nugget
lender.occupation: Attorney, System Analyst, and Service Dog
lender.loan_because: We want everyone to succeed and have a happy life. Love is the answer.
lender.occupational_info: Natalie: Free legal advice hotline and peace and civil/human rights activist Ben: Cancer data system analyst, musician, and peace and civil/human rights activist's sidekick Nugget: Guide/Service Combodog from Paws With A Cause in Michigan, part-time goat, peace and civil/human rights activist's sidekick

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: I've been doing a lot of reading and I've discovered that what the world's impoverished countries need is not just aid, but investment and a source of capital
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes loans to people in our country so that they could buy houses.

lender.name: Jayson
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have many people in my life that have supported my dreams. Kiva is a small way I am able to give back to the dreamers of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that publishes consumer magazines. As creative director I direct the creative direction of our publications and manage a group of talented graphic designers and photographers that design and produce the magazines we publish.

lender.name: Edith Walsh
lender.loan_because: I loan because I like finding a business similar to my own
lender.occupational_info: My work is finding opportunities to help people

lender.name: John and Julie
lender.loan_because: A little from us can make a big difference for others.

lender.name: Dag Jacobsen
lender.loan_because: Its the very least I can do ....... I should be donating the money but atleast this way the cash stays in the lending loop as long as its repaid and thus reloaned again and again !
lender.occupational_info:
Currently unemployed as far as income goes but living in a lucky part of the world I can still lend someone a bit.
But I do a lot of computing stuff without making any money on my skills .. Im also a big retro computing geek, with my main interest in the great Commodore 8bit/16bits C64 and Amiga...
Medically Im recovering from a neurological problem.. Lucky to live in Norway ..

lender.name: chardon
lender.loan_because: this seems to be a truly hands on type of service which allows people to really get involved in the process. with some other agencies, you wonder how much of your money actually gets to the people.
lender.occupational_info: i work for a canadian national tv station. as a tv eng editor, i cut stories for our two and a half hours of local and international news. together with the reporter, we sit and put together reports that focus on everything from the Vancouver polar bear swim to last night's Canuck hockey game highlights to the Wille Pickton murder trial. i have been doing this work for 31 years.

lender.name: Baron
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software to enable mobile phone communications (e-mail/instant messaging/etc...).

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: I lived in Thailand and visted many of the neighboring countries during my time there. The people are so warm and generous that... Well let's just say I do it to lend a hand.

lender.name: Marlon
lender.loan_because: Lending rocks out loud!!!

lender.name: Taeko and John
lender.loan_because: we help each other.

lender.name: Juergen
lender.loan_because:
I wont do it anymore, borrowers pay 17-70% interest on the money you lend... 36% in average!! This is NO help, it is a crime! ...at least here in Germany
This is BULLSH**T

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I have seen how what I consider to be a small amount of money can change a life.

lender.name: Terminale 9
lender.occupation: group of French high school students

lender.name: Wietske & JosÃ©
lender.loan_because: we've been lucky enough .. and kiva is a great way to share.
lender.occupational_info: We look at the inside of people's heads ... but it doesn't hurt!

lender.name: Laila
lender.loan_because: the loans empoweres people.

lender.name: Jean-Michel
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity to do it
lender.occupational_info: I make business recommendations

lender.name: Karen & J
lender.loan_because: We believe in the power of philanthropy to help those who seek the resources they need to achieve success in life. We want to share with others the good fortune life has bestowed upon us.
lender.occupational_info: Karen helps people in crisis who are struggling to overcome addiction. J raises money for local businesses and agencies.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and would like to help other entrepreneurs do well.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing, internet marketing, e-commerce, natural wellness.

lender.name: WELCA
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of women at Trinity Lutheran Church in Brookville, Ohio. We chose to make Kiva our Christmas project this year.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to give back. I want to help someone else make the most of their lives that they possibly can and live a decent, good and value-based so that they can help otehrs to the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a life coach. I help others experience what they want in life and live a purposeful life.

lender.name: Katrine
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping people help themselves is the way to get rid of poverty. And $ 25 is a small price to pay to do that:-)

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: I love reaching though my computer screen to touch the lives of people throughout the world who are just living their lives and working hard for a better future.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: We can all assist others to build better lives in our own small, yet significant, way

lender.name: Zopa.it
lender.loan_because: Zopa promuove l'uso di Kiva.org per la sua valenza sociale.
lender.occupational_info: Italian Social Lending Marketplace

lender.name: Pete and Mary
lender.loan_because: it makes us feel good.
lender.occupational_info: Pete provides care and support to dying people and their loved ones; Mary used to get paid to learn things--greatest job on earth!

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a reason not to.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: we are all equal & those willing to work deserve the opportunity to prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: morphing to sailing the Caribbean looking for suitable places for tropical fruit forests. and supporting microfinance, unitarian universalists, & theElders.org

lender.name: Merle & Maryann
lender.loan_because: we want to assist others in the world to build their business, take care of their families and help others. This is a wonderful way to love one another.
lender.occupational_info: Working with young people (students) to be their friends and help them to grow in the love of the Lord and to love one another.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I believe in the cycle of good will. Many people have helped me along in life and will continue to do so. I want to be able to pass on whatever I can.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to live life to the fullest and to not have any regrets

lender.name: Fiore Grandchildren
lender.loan_because: There is much joy in giving and encouraging others who have a strong desire to succeed and to enable them to utilize their energy to become successful is the best gift our family can receive.
lender.occupational_info: Grandma Fiore is a real estate Broker specializing in commercial owner/user and investment properties in Florida

lender.name: Adams Family
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my family so that we may help others.
lender.occupational_info: I create business websites on the internet.

lender.name: The COVE Staff @ Colgate
lender.occupational_info: Higher education admininstration; service and community outreach

lender.name: Glenn & Family
lender.loan_because: I was given a loan to start my first business and I could not have started without it.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses become larger businesses through marketing, management and development.

lender.name: Gertrude
lender.loan_because: This loan was given in honour of my mother Gertrude. She is a mother of six kids, widowed at a young age, who has always been the anchor of our family. She is a pillar of strength and I know will love watching other strong women succeed in their ventures. Love you mom.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to own a business and want to improve it for yourself and your customers.
lender.occupational_info: I sell children's clothing to retail stores and online.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to make sure that tomorrow is better than today, for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses buy and sell products and services.

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: I like small businesses.

lender.name: Michelet
lender.occupational_info: I am working in accounting for my offices on budget, tracking payments and dues.

lender.name: Gavin, Lisa & Katie
lender.loan_because: We're healthy and live in peace.

lender.name: Darcie
lender.loan_because: I read the book about micro banking by Mohammad Yunis and then saw an Oprah Show about KIVA...I thought what a wonderful idea this all was....a lot better than our welfare system.
lender.occupational_info: I basically send the bills for my company which is an indepentant farming business. We sell fertilizers, herbicides, and Pioneer Seed.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: A little help can make a big difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Yuri
lender.loan_because: Being myself an entrepreneur I would like to support regular people like me - entrepreneurs in their road to success.
lender.occupational_info: I am computer programmer who likes challenge. Also, I am founder of travel agency AA Travel, Inc. which my wife runs. I responsible for supporting our online presence at www.fare-shopper.com.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good!

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: I would love to help make a difference for those working hard to make better lives for themselves.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunities.

lender.name: Nick & Meliss
lender.loan_because: We are lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info:
Nick: Land use and property rights litigation . . . I go to court and fight over land.
Melissa: I design beautiful buildings, resorts and hotels all around the world.

lender.name: Cliff and Debi
lender.loan_because: We were able to start our business because of private loans from people who have faith in our ability to succeed and repay our loan. It's great to have the opportunity to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: We designed and now manufacture mobile office systems that replace the back seat in pickups. They are great if you use your pickup as your office.

lender.name: judith
lender.loan_because: There's a deep need in me to give to those less fortunate. If I could make a positive difference in someone's life, at the end of mine I will go peacefully.
lender.occupational_info: BS. It's an end to means like kiva.com

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupation: Lay leader for Unitarian Universalist Church

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I got the help I needed at the times I needed it most.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers in an agency that helps keep children safe and healthy.

lender.name: GEJ
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to do. I've been very blessed. A little loan can make a big difference. I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: In the 90's I started up a small import/export/distribution business working with artists in Bulgaria, Zimbabwe. Zambia, the UK and USA. It was always a struggle as I did not have enough capital to grow the business and eventually I sold it (for not much money) in order to move onto something more sustainable. I loan because I know what it is like to be full of potential and bursting with ideas, but underfunded.
lender.occupational_info: I now work as a complementary therapist, assisting people in feeling healthier, more optimistic, relaxed and peaceful. I find this to be very satisfying work and like to think I am helping to improve our world one person at a time.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: it is about time we stand up and help others through this small gesture
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help business people achieve their personal and business goals faster that they've ever imagined.

lender.name: Pam
lender.occupation: Columbus Museum of Art - Visitor Services
lender.loan_because: I have been a small business owner and appreciate the energy and dedication it takes to make a successful business. I want to help someone that has a dream and just needs a little help to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I direct the gift shop, the ticket desk and the cafe at the art museum. We sell items, tickets and food to the visitors that come to see our exhibitions.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: GIVING IS THE BEST WAY TO RECEIVE
lender.occupational_info: Service and repair of automobiles, converting hybrid cars to plug in hybrids

lender.name: KeksCrew
lender.loan_because: it is better to invest in people than in hedge funds. We want to spread some joy and give people a chance to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: marketing consultant, architect, supervisor, make-up artist, scientist and mum, HR consultant, houseman, student, teacher, pilot

lender.name: Beth M
lender.loan_because: It is our responsibility to help each other. Each day is a gift and I choose to help someone whose gift is not as bright as mine! Please choose to pay it forward. Help your fellow man. It will make YOU feel better about yourself.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of giving others a chance to start and improve their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate the (wholesale) rates that my (phone) company pays to complete calls to other phone companies all over the world.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: It is fantastic to have the opportunity to directly make an impact by sharing resources with those for whom it can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses to encourage them to contribute to poverty reduction when investing in developing countries. I also run workshops to inspire individual and collective leadership to raise awareness of our impact on each other and the environment and take positive action to improve this.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: What a great way to help people!

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: The very best things about living involve sharing.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I think its one of the best ways to make a difference and effectively give money.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student now, but hope in the future to support businesses in emerging markets.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it is so much fun!
lender.occupational_info: I write about civil rights history in the Mississippi Delta.

lender.name: Nancy & Family
lender.loan_because: I want to help in some way and if my loans do that I am happy. I read about these individuals lives and their businesses and it amazes me what they do. Thank you Kiva for making this possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large office and work on projects to remodel our office space (we have 162,000 square feet), to select fabric, furniture or flooring, and help other people at work do their jobs more comfortably in a pleasant environment.

lender.name: JJ
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I do the statistics for new pharmaceutical products to be submitted to medical agencies throughout the world.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I am happy because I am in a position to be able to do something like this and give back to someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a paralegal in the area of inventions and patents.

lender.name: cynthia
lender.loan_because: sharing is important to me.... in our very small world

lender.name: Michelle & Jim
lender.loan_because: We feel so fortunate and we would like to share that advantage with others around the world that will work hard to better their situation.
lender.occupational_info: We operate two small restaurants.

lender.name: Lindsay + Susanne
lender.loan_because: to give is to receive.

lender.name: JRD
lender.loan_because: There are people in need and I want to help those who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Arlisa
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.occupational_info: Developing solutions for ICT in developing countries.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I simply wish to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I edit video for one of the major news media outlets in the U.S.

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: It's a simple way to help others grow their business and increase their opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: Working with computers and the internet.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so mch!, a little bit of money for a good cause is the LEAST I can do.......
lender.occupational_info: I study the history of Art

lender.name: Juliana
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves. What could be better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English and Spanish.

lender.name: Shirly
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who have the initiation to help themselves and work hard for what they want to achieve in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a technical writer and project manager in the High Tech industry.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: It is beneficial to all
lender.occupational_info: Owner of a counseling center

lender.name: One-Dress Project
lender.loan_because: The One-Dress project makes these loans as we would like to assist women across the world in reaching their goals, dreams and full potential.
lender.occupational_info:
The "One-Dress" has been collectively designed and created by over 1000 women from across the globe via online social networks such as Facebook, Myspace, ASmallWorld, Twitter, etc.
Over the course of eighteen months these women were asked to share information about their lifestyle, dreams and desires as relates to one simple - but truly important piece of clothing - the DRESS. By sharing their likes and dislikes in fabrics, colors, necklines, silhouettes, seasons, etc. the "One-Dress" was conceived, incubated and now released into the universe.
The success of our partnership with Kiva.org is one of the best experiences we have had the pleasure of being involved with.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's a great investment.
lender.occupational_info: I work with elderly and disabled people in support of them living in their own homes rather than in institutions.

lender.name: Franco
lender.loan_because: I would like to be a small part of their future success.

lender.name: niki
lender.loan_because: I want to help others better their lives.

lender.name: S.K.
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.

lender.name: Robert
lender.occupational_info: Manage the development, design and construction aspects, of commercial real estate projects.

lender.name: FamÃ­lia TÃ¡tÃ¡

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: We all need a hand up sometimes!

lender.name: Nate
lender.occupational_info: demonstrating that everyone has the power to change a childâs world, inspiring great places to play within walking distance of every child in America, and creating great playspaces through community participation and leadership

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to communities internationally, and help people to get their businesses off the ground.

lender.name: Eigil
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people directly rather than helping corrupt governments.

lender.name: Eve
lender.loan_because: In my work with IOFC and my travels in Africa and around the world, I have seen how effective microloans can be.
lender.occupational_info: Everything from programming to greeting visiting dignitaries!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I live a comfortable life, and everyone should have the chance to enjoy what the world has to give.
lender.occupational_info: I make dealing with a major company easier over the phone!

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I care. These people need so little and yet it is so big to them. I feel very good when I can help someone achieve their dreams. It is a small thing for me yet it is their whole life.
lender.occupational_info: I am an independant chocolatier presenting chocolate tasting parties. I am also an abstract artist.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I am starting a small renovation business, would like to be able to purchase some tools, business cards and signs to get started..I am also trying to get my contrators license so I will be able to find more work.
lender.occupational_info: I am starting a general renovation business painting, tiling, marble and sheetrock. I have 1 worker,

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in some small way. I read about Kiva and micro-lending and the discipline and dedication of the borrowers impressed me. It is particularly encouraging and enspiring that these entrepreneurs, who have so little means, are seeking loans, with the responsibility of paying back, not just charitable handouts. It is also amazing how what is a tiny amount of money for me can make such a huge difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in implementing next-generation communications technologies, many of which will enrich the lives of many people in even the most remote regions of the world.

lender.name: Ed and Nancy
lender.loan_because: We want to help others in some small way, and Kiva provides a perfect opportunity.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: Helping just one person can make an impact that could change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to express themselves through art.
